item.title: The Absolute State of Document Markup
item.description: Inspired by this talk by Tony Ibbs, as well as my own boiling rage. Notice something wrong? Open an issue. I. What? # That’s a short question with an unfortunately long answer. Let’s start at the beginning. What even is document markup? # Fundamentally, document markup is a way to encode text. That’s it. This implies that some more complex representation of text is producible from a simpler,(1) (1)Keep this in mind.
